init: Creates a ftp client on current folder
init.f: Creates a ftp client erasing possible previous clients
init.force: Creates a ftp client erasing possible previous clients
init.e: Erases a ftp client on current folder
init.erase: Erases a ftp client on current folder
init.c: Clones a ftp client from one folder to another
init.clone: Clones a ftp client from one folder to another

push.f: Uploads an especific file or folder
push.file: Uploads an especific file or folder
push.e: Uploads default folder erasing previous files
push.erase: Uploads default folder erasing previous files
push.ef: Uploads an especific file or folder erasing previous files
push.erasefile: Uploads an especific file or folder erasing previous files

pull.f: Downloads an especific folder from server
pull.file: Downloads an especific folder from server

config:
Shows all configuration info: 

tfc config -u User -s Server -p Port -ps Password -timeout 300
config.u: Sets Default user for FTP conexion
config.user: Sets Default user for FTP conexion
config.s: Sets Default server for FTP conexion
config.server: Sets Default server for FTP conexion
config.p: Sets Default port for FTP conexion
config.port: Sets Default port for FTP conexion
config.ps: Sets Default password for FTP conexion
config.password: Sets Default password for FTP conexion
config.uf: Sets Default upload folder for FTP conexion
config.uploadfolder: Sets Default upload folder for FTP conexion
config.df: Sets Default download folder for FTP conexion
config.downloadfolder: Sets Default download folder for FTP conexion

dir.mkdir: Creates a folder in arg route
dir.ef: Erases arg folder and all it's content

purge.db: Erases all local content in this folder
purge.database: Erases all local content in this folder
purge.s: Erases all content from ftp server
purge.server: Erases all content from ftp server
purge.l: Erases all local content in this folder
purge.local: Erases all local content in this folder
